overview: The plane in which a biologist and an anti-poaching team were travelling on crashed in the extreme cold of the Siberian ice fields. Along with the male lead, is a wild survival expert and a security team among those who managed to escape. The rescue was delayed, their lives were on the brink thanks to the the freezing cold, and they are being threatened by mutant wolves. With the survivors in tow, the hero will embark on a difficult road to survival.
title: The Wolves
